name: Battle Jacked
description:
Battle Jacked is a single-player game where you can create your own battles in simulation mode or get right into the action in instant action mode! The game is designed to give the player freedom to experience battles their way either as a unit or a commander.

Features
  • Single-player battles
  • Simulation Sandbox mode
  • Large Team vs Team AI battles
  • Melee and ranged unit combat
  • Over 42 unique playable characters
  • Fight as knights, goblins, cowboys, pirates, and more
